title: SOLD FS T206 Chief Bender Portrait
author: Cy2009

posts.post_title: SOLD FS T206 Chief Bender Portrait
posts.post_content:
Thank you for your interest. The card is SOLD.


Hi,

I have a T206 Chief Bender (Portrait) for sale. The price is $110 (PayPal friends and family) or $115 (regular PayPal - for fees).

Here is a link to view the card.

[URL="http://www.cyscards.com/t206/06-034.html"]Click here to view the T206 Chief Bender Portrait card.[/URL]

Just a note about me, I used to post a lot more on the Net 54 board a few years back.
I've moved away from collecting but now I am selling some of my remaining cards. I have had many dealings on this board.
I wanted to make this comment because I haven't been on this board that much in a while.

Thanks for looking.

Cy
